history.proof: intros H_ring x H_Ax H_Opp. destruct H_ring as [H_comm [H_group _]]. qsimpl time: 1 use: opp_com. qsimpl time: 1 use: opp_com,opp_neutral. qsimpl time: 1 use: opp_com,opp_neutral. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: pose proof opp_com S A Add O H_comm x O H_Ax H_Ax as H_is_opp.

original: intros H_ring x H_Ax H_Opp. destruct H_ring as [H_comm [H_group _]]. pose proof opp_com S A Add O H_comm x O H_Ax H_Ax as H_is_opp. apply H_is_opp. - apply opp_neutral. apply H_group. - rewrite H_Opp. apply opp_neutral. apply H_group.
